triptypes

Class AllInclusiveResort

  • java.lang.Object
    • triptypes.VacationPackage
      • triptypes.FlightOptionalPackage
        • triptypes.AllInclusiveResort

  • public class AllInclusiveResort
extends FlightOptionalPackage
    This class encapsulates details related to an all-inclusive resort vacation package. Flight information to/from the resort location can be added an additional price. Once at the resort, all-inclusive packages are billed using a flat fee, regardless of the number of included amenities.
    Author:
    bdorn

    • Constructor Detail

      • AllInclusiveResort

        public AllInclusiveResort(java.lang.String name,
                          int numDays,
                          java.lang.String resort,
                          int guestsPerRoom,
                          double pricePerNight,
                          java.lang.String[] amenitiesList)
        Creates a new AllInclusiveResort package.
        Parameters:
        name - The promotional name for this package.
        numDays - The number of days included in this vacation package.
        resort - The name of the resort.
        guestsPerRoom - The number of guests allowed per room at the included price.
        pricePerNight - The price of the stay per night.
        amenitiesList - A list of amenities available for free at the resort.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmenities

        public java.lang.String getAmenities()
        Retrieves a single String containing all of the available amenities at the resort. Individual amenities should be separated by a single comma and space character, with no such separator at the end of the string.
        Returns:
        The amenities list.

      • getGuestsPerRoom

        public int getGuestsPerRoom()
        Retrieves the number of guests allowed per room at the specified rate.
        Returns:
        The number of guests per room.

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        The full price for this all-inclusive package, including any optional flight pricing.
        Specified by:
        getPrice in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The price of a vacation package in US Dollars.

      • getDepositAmount

        public double getDepositAmount()
        The required deposit amount to be made at the time of booking. All upfront flight-related costs and 50% of the total lodging costs for this trip must be paid as a deposit.
        Specified by:
        getDepositAmount in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The deposit amount required in US Dollars.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A formatted summary string with details about this all-inclusive resort package. The string will contain information as described by FlightOptionalPackage followed by details about the resort and the number of people included at the specified price. The second line should be prefixed with 11 blank spaces for alignment below the trip name. For example: 
        $  450.35  Punta Cana Fiesta! (Flight Included)
           An all-inclusive stay at Flip Flops for 2 people!
        Overrides:
        toString in class FlightOptionalPackage
        Returns:
        The formatted string summary.

      • getLodgingCost

        public double getLodgingCost()
        Retrieves the subtotal for lodging associated with this all inclusive resort stay based on the number of nights in the package and the base price.
        Specified by:
        getLodgingCost in class VacationPackage
        Returns:
        The lodging subtotal in US Dollars.
